name: rUSD
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: rUSD is an over-collateralized stable coin minted from staked assets that are simultaneously earning staking rewards on the RAMP platform. Maximize capital efficiency on staked digital assets.
